description: Task management and project tracking with ClickUp integration
author: hauptsacheNet
content: Manage ClickUp tasks and projects directly through Claude for comprehensive project management.
features: Create and update tasks with custom fields
Assign team members and set due dates

steps: Get your ClickUp API key from https://app.clickup.com/settings/apps
Find your Team ID in ClickUp settings
Add the ClickUp server configuration with your credentials

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add clickup --env CLICKUP_API_KEY=YOUR_KEY --env CLICKUP_TEAM_ID=YOUR_TEAM_ID -- npx -y @hauptsache.net/clickup-mcp

security: Use personal API tokens for authentication
Limit permissions to necessary spaces only

troubleshooting.issue: Getting HTTP 429 with rate limit exceeded errors
troubleshooting.solution: ClickUp limits to 100 requests per minute per token. Check X-RateLimit-Reset header for reset time. Implement exponential backoff and wait specified seconds before retry.

troubleshooting.issue: OAuth error: team not authorized for access token
troubleshooting.solution: Re-authenticate to authorize workspace access. Verify OAuth scope includes required permissions and check if user revoked authorization. Generate new API token from ClickUp settings if needed.

troubleshooting.issue: Authorization token missing in header error
troubleshooting.solution: Add Authorization header with your API key to all requests. Format: Authorization: YOUR_API_KEY. Verify token is correctly copied from ClickUp API settings without extra spaces.

troubleshooting.issue: Cannot access tasks or spaces - permission denied
troubleshooting.solution: Verify your ClickUp account has access to target spaces and lists. Check workspace admin settings and ensure API token has necessary permissions for workspace and spaces.
